## Protected Member Functions

### getOperandUseInternal() {#afbda7524d17168713343950a44657d70}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Use llvm::sandboxir::Constant::getOperandUseInternal (unsigned OpIdx, bool Verify) const"
  labels = {["inline", "protected", "virtual"]}>
\\Returns the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/use">Use</a> for the <code>OpIdx&#39;th</code> operand.

This is virtual to allow instructions to deviate from the LLVM IR operands, which is a requirement for sandboxir Instructions that consist of more than one LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/constant-h">Constant.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
